Sentencas: A dehydrogenation anode is reported for hydrocarbon proton conducting solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: CO2 emission free co-generation of energy and ethylene in hydrocarbon SOFC reactors with a dehydrogenation anode

Sentencas: A Cu-Cr2O3 nanocomposite is obtained from CuCrO2 nanoparticles as an inexpensive, efficient, carbon deposition and sintering tolerant anode catalyst.
Titulo: CO2 emission free co-generation of energy and ethylene in hydrocarbon SOFC reactors with a dehydrogenation anode

Sentencas: A SOFC reactor is fabricated using a Cu-Cr2O3 composite as a dehydrogenation anode and a doped barium cerate as a proton conducting electrolyte.
Titulo: CO2 emission free co-generation of energy and ethylene in hydrocarbon SOFC reactors with a dehydrogenation anode

Sentencas: The protonic membrane SOFC reactor can selectively convert ethane to valuable ethylene, and electricity is simultaneously generated in the electrochemical oxidative dehydrogenation process.
Titulo: CO2 emission free co-generation of energy and ethylene in hydrocarbon SOFC reactors with a dehydrogenation anode

Sentencas: While there are no CO2 emissions, traces of CO are present in the anode exhaust when the SOFC reactor is operated at over 700 degrees C. A mechanism is proposed for ethane electro-catalytic dehydrogenation over the Cu-Cr2O3 catalyst.
Titulo: CO2 emission free co-generation of energy and ethylene in hydrocarbon SOFC reactors with a dehydrogenation anode

Sentencas: The SOFC reactor also has good stability for co-generation of electricity and ethylene at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: CO2 emission free co-generation of energy and ethylene in hydrocarbon SOFC reactors with a dehydrogenation anode
